law.catch_line: A person may not willfully and maliciously set fire to or burn the contents of a dumpster or trash r...

text.section: A person may not willfully and maliciously set fire to or burn the contents of a dumpster or trash receptacle that belongs to another.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 30 days or a fine not exceeding $500 or both.
